English: Insert <color=orange>Bulkhead Security Key</color> to activate Bulkhead Door operations {0}
Description:
Don't localize Bulkhead Security Key and Bulkhead Door.
A text that appears on screen when the player is standing close to a Bulkhead Door Controller and carries a Bulkhead Security Key. Don't alter the RichText tags. "{0}" will be replaced by the ID of the Bulkhead Door Controller, don't alter those characters.

French.Translation: Insérez une <color=orange>clé de cloison de sécurité</color> pour activer les opérations {0} de la porte à cloison.

Italian.Translation: Inserisci la <color=orange>chiave di protezione stagna</color> per attivare le funzioni della porta stagna {0}

German.Translation: Stecken Sie den <color=orange>Schott-Sicherheitsschlüssel</color> ein, um den Schotttür-Betrieb {0} zu aktivieren

Spanish.Translation: Inserta la <color=orange>llave de contención [BULKHEAD_KEY]</color> para activar las operaciones de la puerta de contención {0}.

Russian.Translation: Вставьте <color=orange>ключ безопасности</color>, чтобы активировать терминал ворот {0}.

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: Insira a <color=orange>chave de segurança</color> para ativar a operação das portas protetoras {0}

Polish.Translation: Potrzebujesz <color=orange>klucza grodzi</color>, aby aktywować sterowanie grodzią {0}

Japanese.Translation: <color=orange>遮断壁のセキュリティキー</color> を挿入して遮断壁を稼働 {0}

Korean.Translation: <color=orange>격벽 보안 열쇠</color>를 넣어 {0} 격벽 문을 작동하세요.

Chinese_Traditional.Translation: 插入<color=orange>艙門安全鑰</color>以啟動艙門操作{0}

Chinese_Simplified.Translation: 插入<color=orange>舱壁安全钥匙</color>激活舱壁门操作{0}

name: InGame.InteractionPrompt.InsertBulkheadKey_X
